description:
Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap Aloe Vera & Chamomile - A rich and creamy hand wash that removes germs, for healthy beautiful hands. Contains 0% parabens, phthalates, & alcohol.

Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap Aloe Vera & Chamomile contains 100% natural aloe vera and moisturising milk to gently cleanse hands while retaining skin's natural moisture.

The rich and creamy formula leaves hands feeling soft, smooth and nourished.

Feel fresh and cleansed with this gentle and light scent.

95% Natural Origin

What we leave out is as important as what we put in:

- No Parabens.
- No Phthalates.
- No Mineral Oil.
- No Alcohol.
- No Silicones.
- No Soap.
- No Gluten.
- No BPA.
- No animal derived ingredients.

Please recycle! This bottle is recyclable.
 
Refill & save with Palmolive Naturals Hand Wash refills. Use in the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

MOISTURISING HAND WASH: Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap contains 100 percent natural aloe vera, moisturising milk and chamomile extracts

SOFT AND SMOOTH HANDS: Hand wash formula removes germs and leaves hands feeling soft and smooth.

FREE FROM: Parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, alcohol, silicones, soap, gluten, BPA, and animal derived ingredients

GENTLE SCENT: Feel fresh and cleansed with this gentle and light scent.

RECYCLABLE: Made in a recyclable bottle.
name: Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap Aloe Vera & Chamomile 250mL
